arguments.text: Search engine optimization (SEO) continues to evolve rapidly. In 2024, core strategies include focusing on user intent, optimizing for mobile‑first indexing, leveraging AI‑generated content responsibly, and building high‑quality backlinks. Structured data, Core Web Vitals, and E‑E‑A‑T (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness) are critical ranking signals. Practical steps: 1) Conduct thorough keyword research with intent mapping. 2) Audit site speed and mobile usability. 3) Refresh existing content with up‑to‑date stats and clear headings. 4) Create pillar‑cluster content models. 5) Earn backlinks through thought‑leadership pieces and partnerships. Measuring success involves tracking organic traffic, keyword rankings, and conversion rates over time.
